import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html' }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { public todos: any[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { // This calls the .NET Controller this.http.get('/api/todo').subscribe(result => { this.todos = result; console.log('Data received:', result); }, error => { console.error(error); }); } }
